comment.author: 22139308@N03
comment._content: (Female) farmers (farmers wives?) who want to emigrate to Canada at a course about their new homeland (lit. fatherland) in De Witte Bergen (lit. White Mountains) hotel in Oirschot. Netherlands, Oirschot, 9 June 1948.

comment.author: 56591859@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called why canada is best, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
